Nial Fuller – Professional Trader & Investor

Nial Fuller (Australian born Trader, Investor, Author & Entrepreneur).

He operates a private fund (family office) that trades and invests in various financial products, including: equities, futures, foreign exchange, derivatives, bonds and a range of other asset classes including: real estate, private companies and more.
